content.detailedDescription: To southeast of lincoln and yosemite streets there is a birght fish shaped green light with a bliking red light and white ligh emanting from it. it is in one place in the sky and too low to be a star. it is not moving staying in one place so it is not a plane. have been watching it in the same place since 11:00pm tonight. it is now 11:40 and it hasn't moved. i sees like it is a triangle with a object in the middle that seems to have metallic reflection of the lights. the bottom appears a single jet exhaust but is not moving it is in one place. took a closer look with binoculars.
content.summary: Green ball of fire with a red blinking light with bright white light emanating

content.detailedDescription: I was set up to observe the lunar terminator. the moon was at first quarter.  i had a 60x lens with a 2 times barlow inserted to increase my field of view at 120x. as i was observing, 2 slighly oval objects drifted across the field. it was as if i was looking straight up at them. one was slighly behind the other and offset slighly lower. they both had a bronzelike color and they were moving in a northwesterly direction (opposite to what the scope would show). i heard no sounds,saw no lights but it was eerie. i stood in disbelief as to what i saw. i have remained quiet about this for a long time. question? have any others reported a telescope sighting like this. they must be rare.
content.summary: 2 objects, one offset behind the other flew across my field of view in a 6" reflector

content.detailedDescription: I was haveing trouble sleeping, so i was lying on my back looking out at a beautiful stary sky.It was about two am and i had not seen any air traffic in about an hour. all of a sudden something caught my eye comming on at a very rapid rate of speed. .At first i thought it was our air guard starting night practice, but then i realized this this was moveing too fast and too low to be a plane.. i noticed 1 pulslating blue lite on its underside, and if i had to guess it's shape i would have to say. sort of triangle.  i would guess it was no more than 1000 feet above ground.I didn't know what to think when it just stopped, after going so fast. i could hear no sound, not even when it took off again for the south east. i didnt tell anyone about this cause folks up here are pretty skepticle about such things. me included.The object stood still for maybe. four minutes and then it was gone.  funny thing,tho, after i saw it ,whatever it was, i slept like a baby.  i slept very late the next morning, and didn't remember the event untill the next evening.Well there it is. i've got it out of my system.  i hope it helps you in some way.  harold bodden
content.summary: Moved at high speed from south to north, stopped dead overhead , then took off at an arc, toward south east.  very fast.

content.detailedDescription:
Since a huge beam of light sighting at my home on march 12,2005, and 3 triangle sightings since february 14, 2006, (which were all reported & submitted previously along with their submitted pictures and/or video), 
my family & i have witnessed and experienced many strange lights, objects and happenings. i have documented everything with written and photographic/video evidence, when able, of all these happenings. i have included some pictures, which vary, from of a "gold-lighted energy" that is always "observing", an "interesting" orb, and "energy-lines" that morph & change shape, and an interesting "entity" by a family member on a trampoline. since i can only include 3 attachments per report, i will submit duplicate reports, all with different pictures. recently i had pictures from many past years, and multiple cameras, put onto cds. upon further inspection, i have found many other intersting "unexplained" things in those pictures as well. all pictures attached have been cropped/zoomed/enhanced so you can see them better.  these include pictures from 6 years ago, up to current. i get a "blurring effect" many times when "something" is around.
i have all the originals in a safe place & location. 

thank-you! 
patty d.
mufon international field investiagtor and
michigan mufon field investigator
content.summary: many "unexplained objects & or lights, "observing"... different times/dates

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from school around 7:30 iin the evening the usual time, it was a clear night.  not much in the sky by the way of clouds.  i live on the top of a hill and so when i reached the top and turned the corner, i saw it.  it looked to me like it was a helicopter or some aircraft that had burst into flames in the sky.  it was 1 big red fiery ball, then i noticed it wasn't really moving, it just hung there.  it made no sound, and appeared to be really close to the ground. still i thought it was something on fire so i watched it as i raced home, afraid that when it finally fell it would set the whole hill on fire.  then suddenly, it just fell slowly and silently down towards the ground until it was out of sight.  nothing caught on fire and there was no trace of what i had seen. i have no idea what it could been.  it definitely rattled me and left me feeling a little unsettled.  haven't seen anything else since.
content.summary: The fireball that hung in the sky was sure to set something on fire when it fell, but didn't

content.detailedDescription:
An old man in his 80s gave this picture along with
documentation from norad stating they did not know
what it is but request the pictures and negatives.It
was taken over lake powell in the early 90s and as far
i know the man is gone with no family and i hold the
only photo.If the scan comes through well you should
be able to see the burner trail several lengths behind
it.He did not see nor hear the aircraft and was a mere
chance. please do not publish this until we have had
some contact........Thanks and trusting   takota
content.summary: Aurora

content.detailedDescription:
this have been on my mind, since i was 16. i am now 63. so here goes.
in about 58 or 59, my school buddies and i was heading to the drive in 
show, or go-chart track. we have to pass the end of the runway at web air
force base. we can see hangers there also. one hanger, we noticed, had guards, standing, (with arms length) all around the hanger... we just wondered why..Later on (days later)i went to see a new airman friend. i had no promblem going and coming on and off base. my father had been in the police and we had a sticker on the car. my friends "barracks" was real close to the runway, with the hangers in back. i ask him why all the guards
around the hanger.. he said that, he heard, "the marines are guarding a ufo
that crashed in new mexico last week." few days later, i went to pick him up. (we had dates for a party)i noticed the "marines were gone". i ask him about that. he said "they (?) came in here last night, with a big flat bed truck, and later pulled out with a large opject,cloth draped over it.".. end of story...I am now told the web air force base is a prison... i have not been back there. i joined the army in 1960 and left big springs. guess this story is not too interesting, but to me, i finially got it off my chest. never told about this to anyone. in the 70's, a silver disc shape
flew over my head in mansfield, la, no sound,  moving very fast. from then on, i believe in ufo's. later on that day, the radio said they had spotted a ufo close to new orleans...(it was headed in that direction when i seen it)...Thank you for letting me tell you this stories.."leathers" aka
content.summary: Did not see ufo, but related subject

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving the address of 403 jasmine way, clearwater, 33756, a minute after midnight, walking south a short distance to the driveway. i am nearsighted and i did not have my glasses on, so i could not see detail at that distance, nor could i tell the distance in the dark. peripherally i noticed a large, bright moving object almost directly overhead and looked up. it was traveling directly south (or perhaps falling in front of me) at a speed that would be very fast if distant or falling, glider speed if it were only skimming the three-story-tall trees i was near. i only observed it for a couple of seconds traveling in a straight line before it was obscured by the tree foliage. i was in a small clearing. there was no noise. my first thought was, "could that have been a shooting star." my second thought was, "no, that was way, way, way too big to be a shooting star." my next thought was a firework, but i eliminated that as there was absolutely no sound in that very quiet neighborhood. my next thought was perhaps i should report it to the police. my last thought was perhaps i should report it to mufon. i immediately entered my car and noted the time--one minute after midnight.
content.summary: Large, bright, strangely silent object flashed across part of sky from north to south

content.detailedDescription: In back yard looking at the harvest moon and saw a bright flash to the notrh west. watched and saw it falling prety close.I thought it was a falling star. then faded out and saw it for a   verry short ammount of time and that was it.
content.summary: Bright, falling

content.detailedDescription:
i was on the way to work that morning.
i was driving down commerce road in loudon.
i notice a strange glowing white round  light moving in a distance,
it was moving slow.
but some trees was blocking my view.
 i was driving down commerce road.
when i got at the gate at the warehouse.
i got out of my truck to open the gate at the warehouse.
i look over the warehouse.
 i still could see it but it was further away.
then it disappeared.
 after it was gone.
 i open the gate.
 i got back in my truck and drove in the parking lot and park my truck.
i got out of my truck and walk over to the warehouse and open the door.
i walk in the door.
after i got inside of the warehouse .
i cut the burger alarm off .
i stood there a few minutes, then i realize i forgot to put my soft drinks in my cooler.
i walk back out i was looking all over the sky.
 while i was walking back to my truck.
i open my truck door and started putting my soft drinks in my cooler.
after i was done i close my truck door and turn around.
then i was stunned by a light shining down on me,
it made me look up.
the light was pretty high up.
i keep looking up at the light.
then it started to dim down then the light went out.
there was no sound.
i had to get my eyes focus.
i lean over sideway to see if i could see it.
i could see it but i could not make out the shape.
all i could see was a black object moving north there was no lights on it,
 then it made a turn,   then  went west.
 i watch it until it went out of sight.
the sightings happen around 7:10 am in the morning.
it was not daylight yet but the sky was started to get a little light.
after it was over i walk back into the warehouse 
                       written by eddie moore
content.summary: I saw a ufo that look like a low glowinglight moving then it disappeared  when i got to the warehouse i went inside then i came back out and put my soft drink in my cooler when i started to walk away a light came on me and it went out while i was looking
content.locationName: Loudon and the next knoxv, Tennessee

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on front porch looking east and suddenly noticed 3 green discs persumably from the same craft zoom across the sky at what seemed a fairly low altitude (under 5,000 ft.). the discs seemed only perceptable from the correct angle because after watching it fly a distance of about 10 miles in the matter of about 20 sec. it was no longer visible. my perception was that you had to be virtually directly under the craft in order to see the green discs which i presume had something to do with its perpulsion system. keep in mind it was dark out with no overcast and it was defintely not a reflection on the clouds. it was totally silent and moved very smoothly and steadily. by the time i thought to take a picture with my camera phone it was no longer visible. please let me know if you have had similiar reports especially in my area.
content.summary: I was sitting on front porch looking east and suddenly noticed 3 green disc persumably from the same craft which seemed only perceptable from the correct angle after watching it fly a distance of about 10 miles in the matter of about 20 sec.

content.detailedDescription:
this sighting happens around 11:20 am
i walk out of my house.
 i was going to my truck to put a bag of garbage in the back of my truck.
i  looked up.
i could see a plane moving north then i notice 
 a strange light in the east sky
i started watching it.
it look like a star then it started to move.
it flew over me then it vanish while i was looking at the ufo
to me it look like it flew into a wall of nothing. 
          written by eddie moore
  i had so many ufo sighting it does not bother me any more to see them i got more sighting that happen after this sighting 5 more i will sent them when i get the type up i got them on paper but not type up i beleve that im being watch after i was abducted in 1997 my ufosighting started about 10 years ago when i was 42 years old it don't seam that the sighting or going to ever quit they come in spirts  i don't see them every day and there is nobady on this planet can stop ufo sighting i have no problem sleeping i have learn to live with the sighting because i have no choice
content.summary: I went to put a bag of garbage in the back of mt truck i look up and saw a ufo then it started to move in my direction and it flew over me and vanish while i was looking at the light that llok like a star moving

content.detailedDescription:
While visiting my cousin in peru, ny we were traveling to mount josephine to do some climbing.  we made several stops along the way to take pictures of the colored leaves and scenery.  when i got home to florda and previewed the pictures on my tv i noticed a dark circular spot over the mountain. in the second picture there is something dark going across the mountain, not over it, but across the colored leaf scenery. this one was taken while approaching the town of wilmington as shown in the picture.  i'm not sure if the other one was also in that area as we made so many stops, but i suspect it may be. i didn't see these while taking pictures as i was concentrating on the scenery.  i emailed the pictures to my son who enhanced them on his computer.  i said they're birds, that he definitely see wings.  he said they were no doubt closer in the foreground.  my other son who is a mufon member as am i feels they are ufos.  he and i both seem to see a disturbance of the air around the larger one, like you'd see heat waves on a road in the heat of the summer. 
i hope you can determine if they are birds or truely ufos, which is my hope as i've never seen one and was very excited about he possibility that i had one on film.
looking forward to hearing from you.
content.summary: Appeared to be circular, appeared to be metalic, whitish tone underneith, dark on top.

content.detailedDescription: In the fall of 1971 my sister ,her boyfriend tom and i were babysitting at a home in warren, pa. sometime between 11 pm and midnight we heard what we thought were lots of sirens going off. the house we were sitting at was at the bottom of something the locals call high school hill. the school sits on top of a very high hill. tom and i left my sister with the kids and went to the top of the hill. we wondered if there was a fire at the local refinery. we started up the hill and thats all i can remember except for bits and pieces. i can remember standing beside tom in the middle of a bright light. outside the perimeter of the lights, in the shadows were what i thought were people trying to speak to us. i remember saying to tom'" they're trying to talk to us ". at which time he replied " no, its only the wind in the trees." the strange thing was that when we talked it was without speaking and i told him " no, they are trying to talk to us!". the next thing i remember was a beam of light, it lit up the hillside like daylight,but it was a funny color. the next thing i remember was standing and staring staight up in the air at a tremendous ball of light, it was  like fire and as i stood there and watched it, it got smaller. i don't remember us coming back down. and the funny thing was it took me awhile to remember that much. it just came back to me one night like i had been slapped in the face. when i called my sister to ask her if she remembered anything about the night we heard the sirens, she got excited and said " thats so weird, i remember you guys came running down off the hill saying " we saw something, we saw something!'. she said you know whats really funny?, its kind of like somebody threw a switch or something because we all forgot it at once. she said we had been up there for 2 to 3 hours. all i can remember are those brief bits. i have tried and tried to rememberwhat happened that night, but to no avail. i had one strange conversation with tom after that. he and my sister had gone their separate ways by then and i had to track him down. when i asked him if he remembered the night we went up the hill, he seemed to get agitated and said he couldn't talk about it. that was 30 years ago, i would give anything to remember and get those missing hours back. there have been other strange occurances since then.
content.summary: Missing time and memory flashes of contact

content.detailedDescription:
The first picture was taken on may 15, 2006. the second picture was taken on july 22, 2006. both photo's were taken towards my back woods (west) just after sunset. these photo's are almost similar to one another in that both objects have a dark trail behind them. i took a few pic's of the same area, so have both before and after shots all taken within less than a minute and showing how these things appeared, then were gone. i've never seen anything like this before and thought others might be interested.
 
the camera they were taken with is a konica minolta 12x optical zoom, anti-shake, 6.0 megapixels.

thanks,
michelle
content.summary: Lights with trails

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home with a friend when i noticed a brilliant white light giving off flares of all sorts of colors. red, orange, yellow, purple, and blue. we pulled over to watch for a while, then went to get binoculars at his house. we kept watching for almost an hour and a half, all the while noticing that it was getting smaller and smaller until it looked like just a bright star. i noticed a slight disc shape to the object through the binoculars, but it was too far away to tell for sure. when it was closer in, i could see that it was moving side to side in relativity to another star we used as a reference point. we watched it for almost three hours, but near the end, i would've confused it for any other star in the sky had i not been watching it the whole time.


email me if you have questions that need answering.
content.summary: Brilliant white light giving off flares of red, yellow, purple. appeared to fly away slowly until it looked like another star.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home with a friend when i noticed a brilliant white light giving off flares of all sorts of colors. red, orange, yellow, purple, and blue. we pulled over to watch for a while, then went to get binoculars at his house. we kept watching for almost an hour and a half, all the while noticing that it was getting smaller and smaller until it looked like just a bright star. i noticed a slight disc shape to the object through the binoculars, but it was too far away to tell for sure. when it was closer in, i could see that it was moving side to side in relativity to another star we used as a reference point. we watched it for almost three hours, but near the end, i would've confused it for any other star in the sky had i not been watching it the whole time.
content.summary: Brilliant white light giving off flares of red, yellow, purple. appeared to fly away slowly until it looked like another star.

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving that same bar that betty and barney hill used to hang ou tin, and next thing i know, theres a metal cigar thing in my hynee, and i'm singing soprano. darn greys are all disguting perverts. next time, i won't drink cheap booze.
content.summary: It was cold and metalic.

content.detailedDescription: It was on hallowean night when me and my mom were driving near albertsons  when at the corner of my eye i saw a flaming and fast going down towerds the north ...I think its in seatle or mount st helens.
content.summary: It looked like a flaming  torpedo

content.detailedDescription: When i was 17 years old, a friend of mine and i were driving east on balzerscak drive near mankato state university in summer of 1982 (approx june or july)when i caught a glimpse of a strange object moving from north to south near the eastern city limits of mankato. we immediatly stopped the car and got out to see if we could get a better look and to make sure it wasn't a reflection on the inside of my windshield. the object was a series of spherical orbs redish purple in color. i couldn't tell if they were connected but they moved as if they were. when it passed in front of us it was clear that it was three dimensional. we could not hear any noise from the object. it was very early (approx 2am) and no other cars/people were in the area. we observed it for 10-15 seconds as it steadily moved over the tree line to the south until we were unable to see it anymore. we were a little scared and excited about what we observed but pretty much kept it to ourselves because we didn't think anyone would take us seriously. a day or two later, there was a small story in the mankato free press newspaper about a law enforcement official who was at the mankato airport about 3 miles northeast of mankato at the same time we observed the object. he described the same object except he was 3-4 miles east of us looking west. that info allowed us to locate the object approx 1 mile east of mankato. altitude was difficult to estimate but it was below scattered clouds. i cannot remember the exact date which is unfortunate because i would like to read the story the officer gave the newspaper again so i can get the exact date and time.
content.summary: String of sphere shaped redish purple objects moving north to south horizon to horizon.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were on our way home from the grocery store at about 10:25. as we turned off of oklahoma avenue and on to howell ave (heading north), i noticed what i thought was an airplane on approach to the airport (we live about 3-4 miles due north of general mitchell international airport).  what i thought was a plane was over humbolt park.  i said to my wife that it was really bright and low, which i thought was a little odd. i originally thought it was a airliner because i could see 3 large lights from where we turned and i assumed that it was the headlights for the plane.  i kept watching the object because of how low it was (i wondered if it was having engine trouble or something like that).  as we traveled north along the west end of humbolt park i realized that the "plane" wasn't moving.  i said "what the hell is that?" at this point and my wife pulled over to see what i was now watching very closely.  we sat on the west edge of the park trying to figure out what it was for about 2 minutes.  during this time, my wife was saying that she thought it was a bunch of light poles.  i said that i didn't think it was because it was too big. futrhermore, i could very faintly see the outline of the object.  it had three large white lights along the bottom. on what i would soon realize was the backside of the object there were 2 smaller yellow lights.  near the top and back of what looked like a low pyramid was a small white blinking light.  the shape was, as far as i could tell from the faint outline, a low pyramid, but the object was definately triangular from a bottom view (i could tell this because when it moved it looked triangular from below and behind).  we were roughly 150-200 yards away from the object. i would guess that it was about 100-200 feet in the air.  the object appeared to be about the size of a small commercial airliner. i was at this point still unsure of what i was looking at because it simply didn't seem possible that i was looking at a ufo.  i would consider myself something of a skeptic about most ufo reports, so i didn't actually think i could be looking at a legitimate ufo.  i can honestly say that i was shocked by what happened next, not because it was so spectacular, but because it was so unnatural based upon everything that i had ever seen fly.  at this point, i was still thinking that the object must be a baloon or something stationary having to do with something in the park. the object made no noise, however, it moved south toward the airport.  the amazing part was how it moved.  it did not accellerate.  it just moved about 40-50 mph instantaneously and silently.   i at this point said "holy s#&@!!!! did you see that?!?!?" my wife replied "yeah" much more calmly than i had asked.  i was stunned and i still couldn't believe what i saw, so i told my wife (who was driving) to follow it so i could get another look at it; however, the object was already out of sight at this point.  we tried to follow it anyway.  we drove through the park and then south on howell ave. all the way to the airport.  we never again saw the object.  i am sure that the airport had to have seen the object, but i do not know who to contact to find out if my wife and i are the only people who saw it.  additionally, this all happened inside of the city of milwaukee, in a very heavily populated area; therefore, i am sure that someone else had to have seen this object.  i have always liked aviation, so i have at least a basic knowledge or aeronautics.  there is not a single aircraft that i am aware of that can hover and move silently.  furthermore, i am not aware of any aircraft that can move without having to accellerate in order to get up to speed.  it was not a helicopter because first of all it was silent, and second, it was way too big.  so assuming that it was not a helicopter, i don't think that it is possible to fly any large aircraft as silently and slowly as this object was moving without staling and crashing.  i'm not crazy and i'm not a kind of person who sees a ufo every time a plane goes over our house.  i am 100% possitive that i not only saw what i saw, but also that there is nothing in the known world that can move like this object did.  i plan on doing a sketch to submit, but i wanted to get this info down while it is still fresh in my mind.  please contact me if there are any other reports of this object from either the airport or other witnesses.
content.summary: My wife and i saw a u.F.O. hovering over a park. we watched it for about 2 min trying to figure out what it was.  it moved toward the airport at about 40-50 mph with no sound

content.detailedDescription: We were watching fireworks in the distance ,slowly an orange object appeared in the sky about fifteen degrees from the horizon...And appeared to stop over us but high in the sky..Appeard to be the size of jumbo aircraft..I was a pilot...And have my perspectives...The craft was there about less than an hour..It was frightning to see and very real..Then all of a sudden ten white orbs came from all directions and began going up into the ships bottom into the craft..What was really astounding is that one of the orbs..Waited until all the others were in  the craft,then it ascended into the ship...Like it was making sure all other orbs where back in the ship..Then the orange glowing craft,you could  see it quite clearly slowly angled up and accelerated away,,fading from human eye contact..This is the truth..We tried to contact people regarding this incident but there was no place to report this in 1984.We have never forgotten this incident ,we were sober and of sound mind and my wife a teacher and i was a former policeman and spent ten years as a private pilot and consider ourselves rational people..Chris zeagman barb zeagman
content.summary: Orange color..More dumbell shape..Ten white balls of lite,returned to large craft and one stayed out until all were in side and the large ship angled upwards and shot  up and disappeard

content.detailedDescription: I'm a towboat captian travaling down the mississippi river with 8 loaded barges coming down on algiers point and just went under the greater new orleans bridge and gondola that was up then because this was the time of the worlds fair in new orleans when my 2 deckhands and i was in the wheelhouse and saw a blueish/green light lighting up the whole area and as it got brighter and brighter it was more green at the brightest point like high noon and at that time we knew that it was coming from above us, we ran out of the wheelhouse and looked up, by this time the light went out and we saw a bullet shaped object that had a yellow firery flame coming from it that was about 3 times larger than the object and it was staionary in the sky way up there. we was saying wow look at that why isn't it moving and about that time it took off to the south east so fast that it left a white line in the sky for a second. than all over the vhf marine radios everyone was talking about it , also on the fm radio we had it on b97 station the disk jockey said he was getting alot of phone calls about a strage blue green light in the sky and if anyone has any info on this ufo theory please call and he will have more on this subject!...Needless to say we listen to that radio station the rest of the night and nothing else was said about it. so that is what i seen in 1984 and have never forgot it since...It had to be high and big because other captians seen it that was over miles from new oleans at the time and seen the same thing straight above them also.
content.summary: Bullet shape with point and fire out of squarer end 3 times larger than the objet not moving straight above us

content.detailedDescription:
I was asleep, at home in my bed at about 4 am.  i then woke up, feeling wide awake.  i was facing towards my window, and high in the sky about two thirds of a mile away, i saw 4 orange circular lights in a perfect square, not to far apart from each other yet not close enough to be an object i have seen.  i kept staring at it, and it didn't move an inch or change.  because of that, i started to feel scared, so i watched tv for about 5 minutes but that didn't help.  i looked and it was still there, in the exact same spot.  i closed my eyes for a minute or so.  then, the 4 orange lights blinked twice and then a large, thick, grey streak of what looked like jet fuel came from beneath it and it flew off very fast straight up into the sky.  

after the event, like anybody who saw a ufo, thought of the possibilities it could have been:
-at first, a helicopter.  but i doubt a helicopter would stay in the exact same spot for 10 minutes (especially at 4 in the morning) and have orange circular lights arranged in a square.
-then, a space shuttle or a rocket.  4 circular lights, the heavy trail of fuel and the speed makes sounds like a space shuttle.  but i live in a northwest suburb of chicago, where there are no space stations for at least 1,000 miles.
-then i thought maybe i just had a very odd illusion.  but i am not on any illegal drugs and i don't drink.  the only medicine i had took before that day was ibuprofen, which doesn't have any side effects of that nature.  i don't think it could be that i was tired because like i said i was wide awake at that time.  
and i highly doubt it could be an object such as a plane i was mistaking it for, i have very good vision, especially far away.  also, my uncle is a pilot so i learn a lot from him.   
-then, i realized that it was maybe an actual 'ufo' (time travelers, aliens, ancient astronauts, etc)  about 15 hours after the event, it still remains to me as the definition of ufo-unidentified flying object.       

as soon as i woke up before the whole event, i felt scared even though the sighting hadn't taken place yet.  like i said i felt scared through out the sighting, and didn't really fall asleep until an hour after the moment.  i felt like i was being watched the whole time.  i wouldn't say that i was terrified though.  now, i am over the moment and i am not scared at all, but curious if anyone else saw what i saw, or more, and what it is.

the attachment is a microsoft paint drawing of the object(s).  it isn't very good, but it somewhat gets to the point.  if you have anymore reports from people in the st charles/south elgin area, or have an idea of what i saw, please email me at cubfan05@comcast.Net
content.summary: Ufo sighting in northwest suburbs of chicago

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to smoke a cigg. looked up and seen a reddish ,orange circluar orb light in the sky going to the east. it looked like it made a 90 degree turn to the north and shot up out of sight in less then 3 to 4 seconds. this isn't the first time i've seen a round reddish ,orange orb in the sky in bayou george.It made no sound and there was a plane to my left that i seen. i live over a airport fly zone. i know the difference from a airplane and something that not a airplane. i don't know what it was ,but it sure didn't move like a plane.
content.summary: Reddish,orange orb, solid light ,no flasing moving quick,no sound

content.detailedDescription:
I walked out the apartment building at around 10:00 pm, maybe a little earlier, on the 14th or the 15th of june, or maybe even the 13th...Posted about it on the 16th of june 2006, however.   anyway, i saw a low flying aircraft, zooming like it was going to land in the city, and it didn't have any sound.  that's all.  i thought it was weird, and then the summer got so hot and all.   

now, this next part is facetious, but, for what it's worth, it "happened."

of course, once, too, several years ago, near the same spot but up a block, i was walking along in the evening, and this van drove by, of course, and everyone was partying in it, and it appeared to drive up close to me.   after it passed me, i heard a bang, and looked around instantly just a second after it passed...No wreck, but no van either. 

that's all...Anything else has been fancy on my part...Staring too long at a bright star, and imagining that it grows closer and brighter.   

i am a ufo believer and am not mocking...That in june, for what it's worth happened...I believe in ufos my sister was one of the fifties/early sixties kids who saw a weird thing hovering really near she and her friends and they called it a balloon...I wasn't born yet or else i was in the pram.   and my mother, her sisters, and my maternal grandparents had one of those weird, blue balls of fire events in their home back in the thirties during the depression. 

mufon rocks!  

and, question:   about the moon echoing hollow on the dark side...Do all astral objects not surrounded by an atmosphere so sound?
content.summary: Weird flying space craft, zooming down, no sound

content.detailedDescription:
Okay i am typing this after just witnessing something very strange. 

i was just watching tv and my mum told me to look outside the window. there were 6 fairly large orange orbs extremely high up flying in a formation (see attachment) 

they drifted across the sky for a few minutes before disappearing behind some clouds. 
moments later three other orbs (two of which were the same and one was slightly larger with a white core) went across the sky travelling in the same direction. 
then just as i began to think that they were planes, an actual plane began flying from over my house towards them (still very high up). 

my house is on the top of a hill and all of the fireworks that are in my range of view are relatively no higher than my house, and these were miles up (i'm not informed enough to make an accurate estimate) 

the first objects took about 180 seconds to pass over. of the next three, the smaller two disappeared (as in now you see me now you don't) after approximately 90 seconds, but the larger one stayed for 180 seconds like the first ones. 

as my cousin had taken the camera to a fireworks display, i couldn't take a picture.
content.summary: 9 ufo's passed across the sky. 6 in formation, followed by two of similar size and a larger one

content.detailedDescription:
the other night 10/27/06 at about 10pm my son and daughter and son in-law
and my brother were outside in the hottub with the lights out looking
for shooting stars. we saw a shooting star and said ooooh ahhhh! then a
triangle shaped object flew over our house approx 4-5 hundred feet up
with very dim lighting (looked almost like it was reflecting the star
light off of it) then as it flew towards the tree line it banked towards the west out to the ocean.
 what really stunned us all was the absence of any noise at all! almost
as if it were a fast moving glider. after searching the internet for
hours, the only thing that comes close to what we saw is the pictures
they have on space.Com. after discussing it between ourselves we think it not to be an et craft but something from the military. but why here in this little coastal town? what i read on space.Com almost exactly describes what we all saw, slow,low,big,silent and dim lighting.
we live in eureka,ca we have some military aircraft training here in
the mountain ranges just east of us where the they do maneuvers in the
river canyons. however, we have never seen anything like this. bryan c.
content.summary: Flying stealth craft.

content.detailedDescription:
I was up on the roof of my house cleaning out the leafs from the gutters and had been doing it for about a half hour.  it was a beautiful day for us in november, blue sky with almost no cloud cover.  i climbed up to the apex of my roof to just take a break and lay down on my back and looked up at the sky as i was laying on my back.
directly above my line of sight i saw a white "dumbell" that was moving east.  it was way, way up in the sky, and thus was quite small i would say slightly larger than you would see if you see a jet flying over at high altitude where you can still make out a perfect shape of the plane but it is still very small.  i could cover the object with the tip of my little finger if i strechted out my hand to full length.  
even though i initially saw the dumbell shape, i realized there is nothing that flies in the sky that is dumbell shaped so i kept watching it trying to figure out what it was.  i thought it might be a white pelican as we have these around our area, though not this time of year.  they fly very high, have about a six feet wingspan and when they fly high and soar on the thermals as high as they fly, you can still tell they are birds with the naked eye, can see the wings etc.  from all the ones i have watched before.  i quickly ruled out a bird, no flapping, this had a "bar" connected to two white spheres on either side of the bar and the bar was a perfect line, a bird would be thick in the center with smaller wings seen on each side.  i thought could it be 2 white balloons somehow tied together and floating high in the air, but quickly discounted this as well because if it were two balloons connected, from the distance this thing was away from me, there would be no string or rope that one could see from that distance.  yet, i could clearly see a  white horizontal line that had the same color white spheres on each end.  
the object was oriented perfectly horizontal with the bar parallel to the horizon and the spheres on either side, right and left.  as the object moved at a rapid pace east, the object rotated clockwise slowly 90 degrees so the bar was perpendicular to the horizon and the spheres were facing up and down.  it did not seem to rotate any more and seemed to stay in that orientation.  there was no change in color, no sound, no pulsation, no metallic look or any change shape that i could tell.  as far as the speed of this thing i stretched out my finger and followed it across the sky for about 20 seconds in a slow arc of my arm, until it dissappeared (not vanished) as it continued to move further away until it was not visible anymore.  nothing was emmitted from the object, no sound, no vapor trail etc.  
as i layed there for the next 15 minutes thinking of what i saw, i saw a jetliner above heading eastword and compared the size and speed of what i had seen to this jet.  the relative size was just a hair larger than the jet was at its full altitude (can make out the jet shape) and the speed was about the same as i tracked it with my finger and arm. it was out of sight at about the same length of time as the object i saw.  i remained calm as i saw this, and tried to be as objective as i could.
content.summary: White dumbell shaped ufo slowly rotated on axis as traveled eastword

content.detailedDescription: My husband woke up at 5:00 a.M. and couldn't sleep, so got up.  at 6:00 a.M., he looked out of a window upstairs, and saw white lights moving in such a strange pattern that he woke me up to see what i thought of it.  he is very much a skeptic on the ufo subject, but he and i ruled out everything in our experiences that could explain what we saw.  the sky was overcast.  there were four, and sometimes five, round lights with hazy perimeters (as opposed to circles with perfect outlines) that circled a large area in the sky in an intercepting pattern - reminiscent of a diagram of the path of atmomic particles, but two dimensional - for about two seconds, then converged in the center of the cirular area for about one or two seconds, then zoomed outward to repeat the pattern.  before waking me up, in  addition to the circling lights, my husband had observed another, larger white light glowing over the neighbor's house a short disctance away, which had disappeared when i came to the window.  we watched the circling lights for about 20 minutes until they appeared to ascend higher and fade a bit, at which time my husband left the window.  i continued to watch until they again seemed to ascend and completely fade out, which was at 6:30 a.M.  they did not look like search lights.  at times we could barely see a beam or two, which radiated from closer to the center of the circle, rather than outside of it as a search light would do.  also, the circle of light that a search light makes is more defined and connected to a beam.  these were not like that, and, as i said, were so strange to my husband that he wanted me to see.  he called the snohomish police department this morning, but they had had no reports of this sighting.
content.summary: Pattern of 5 lights circling in large radius, then meeting in the center, then repeating.
